text:
Cannabis for Seniors

"53 million seniors reside in North America. The legal status of #cannabis and the resulting erosion of negative stigma is motivating many seniors to try #marijuana for #arthritis, #cancer, and #osteoporosis.

#LearnAndTeachOthers™ > https://t.co/5Ky6SoPd7U https://t.co/RTnDi1wp9D
